00035 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00036 {
00037         if(argc>1)
00038         {
00039                 if(strcmp(argv[1],"-D")==0 || strcmp(argv[1],"-d")==0)
00040                 {// DEBUG MODE
00041                         GLTetraRendering* RobotDemo = new GLTetraRendering();
00042                         RobotDemo->initPhysics();
00043                         //RobotDemo->getDynamicsWorld()->setDebugDrawer(&gDebugDrawer);
00044                         //RobotDemo->setDebugMode(btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawConstraints+btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawConstraintLimits);
00045                         return glutmain(argc, argv,640,480,"TetraBot", RobotDemo);
00046                 }
00047                 if(strcmp(argv[1],"-v")==0 || strcmp(argv[1],"--version")==0)
00048                 {// VERSION MODE
00049                         printf("TETRABOT version 12.243 alpha\n");
00050                 }
00051                 if(strcmp(argv[1],"-h")==0 || strcmp(argv[1],"--help")==0)
00052                 {// VERSION MODE
00053                         printf("Usage : tetrabot [OPTION]\n");
00054                         printf("Ce projet vise à modéliser, simuler et faire évoluer un robot de type tétraédrique dans un environnement martien.\n\n");
00055                         printf("  -d, -D\t\tdesactiver l' interface graphique OGRE\n");
00056                         printf("  -h, --help\t\tafficher l'aide-mémoire\n");
00057                         printf("  -v, --version\t\tafficher le nom et la version du logiciel\n\n");
00058                         printf("Rapporter toutes anomalies sur <http://forum.artilect.fr>.\n");
00059 
00060                 }
00061         }
00062         else
00063         {// OGRE MODE
00064                 try 
00065                 {
00066                         TetraRendering *rendering = new TetraRendering();
00067                         rendering->createScene();
00068                         rendering->run();
00069 
00070                         delete rendering;
00071                 } 
00072                 catch(Ogre::Exception& e) 
00073                 {
00074 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00075                         MessageBox( NULL, e.getFullDescription().c_str(), "An exception has occured!", MB_OK | MB_ICONERROR | MB_TASKMODAL);
00076 #else
00077                         std::cerr << "An exception has occured: " <<
00078                                 e.getFullDescription().c_str() << std::endl;
00079 #endif
00080                 }
00081                 catch(...)
00082                 {
00083 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00084                         MessageBox( NULL, "Autre exception", "An exception has occured!", MB_OK | MB_ICONERROR | MB_TASKMODAL);
00085 #else
00086                         std::cerr << "An exception has occured: " << std::endl;
00087 #endif
00088                 }
00089         return 0;
00090         }
00091 }
